Articles.Content: Alright so I'm not saying we need a cockpit that specifically a "fighter jet" cockpit, but Id like to see one that has a glass dome that opens and closes on a hinge so it looks really cool when they get out of the craft
The mk1 inline cockpit would work quite well for that.

Yeah, the inline cockpit is meant to look fightery. I'd rather have a full glass front cockpit. Useless during reentry, but who cares if it would look awesome. Would probably suit rovers quite well. Good front visibility is the key when going around rough terrain in something that's worth a billion dollars.
Yes, the Mk 1 Inline should get that
